mapper.select: SELECT distinct info.id,info.name FROM `folksonomy_info` info LEFT JOIN `folksonomy_business_rel` ref ON ref.is_delete = 0 and info.id = ref.folksonomy_id WHERE ref.business_id = #{id}

SELECT a.*, b.org_id,b.org_name,b.org_address FROM ( SELECT o.activity_info_id, o.member_id, o.shop_id, m.id as memberId,m.real_name,m.sex,m.birthday, m.province,m.city,m.county,m.address,m.create_time FROM `pre_flash_order_info` o LEFT JOIN `member_info` m ON o.member_id = m.id ) a LEFT JOIN `pre_activity_qr_code_info` b ON a.activity_info_id = b.activity_id AND a.shop_id = b.org_id

SELECT o.activity_info_id, o.member_id, o.shop_id,o.shop_name,o.shop_address, m.id as memberId,m.real_name,m.sex,m.birthday, m.province,m.city,m.county,m.address,m.create_time,m.phone_number,m.nick_name FROM `pre_flash_order_info` o LEFT JOIN `member_info` m ON o.member_id = m.id

SELECT o.activity_info_id, o.member_id, o.shop_id,o.shop_name,o.shop_address, m.id as memberId,m.real_name,m.sex,m.birthday, m.province,m.city,m.county,m.address,m.phone_number,m.nick_name FROM ( SELECT distinct o.activity_info_id, o.member_id, o.shop_id,o.shop_name,o.shop_address FROM `pre_order_info` o WHERE activity_info_id is not null AND shop_id is not null ) o LEFT JOIN `member_info` m ON o.member_id = m.id

select pre_activity_info.* from pre_flash_order_info pre_flash_order_info join pre_activity_info pre_activity_info on pre_flash_order_info.activity_info_id = pre_activity_info.id where pre_flash_order_info.member_id = ${memberId}
and pre_flash_order_info.flash_order_state = 0 and pre_flash_order_info.end_time >= now() and pre_activity_info.activity_state = 2 and pre_activity_info.end_time >= now()
and pre_flash_order_info.flash_order_state = 1
and (pre_flash_order_info.flash_order_state = 0 and ( pre_flash_order_info.end_time < now() or pre_activity_info.activity_state = 4 or (pre_activity_info.activity_state = 2 and pre_activity_info.end_time < now()) ) )
order by pre_flash_order_info.create_time desc
